0.title: 300 - Human Trafficking Awareness
0.plot: Host Dani Gasparini learns from San Mateo Councilmember Maureen Freschet many important details about human trafficking and what people can do about it. National Trafficking Hotline and Text #: 1-888-373-7888 or text HELP or INFO to BeFree (233733)
